name: Hyperaction
overview: Portions of the maze can be move to trap your enemies. You are not allowed, however, to push any objects onto your pursuers, or over any of the items that you are trying to collect. * You will need to move quickly and decisively into a safe position at the beginning of each game, particularly on alternate screens - after screen one. * If you cannot trap your opponents in the early stages of a game, try and create an area in which you cannot be attacked and work outwards from there. * There is a way of gaining more time - but we know you won't need our help to find it...
